summary: Tournament management app with configurable multi-stage round-robin groups and rules-based advancement into manually adjustable knockout brackets, enforcing only valid progression structures.
architectural_notes: Per round-robin stage: user-defined group count and advancement rules (not global).
System must enforce only valid team progression structures; do not auto-add byes to fix invalid sizes.
Knockout bracket should be manually adjustable by the user after qualifiers are determined.
known_issues: Advancement logic currently incorrect for multi-stage round-robin to knockout scenarios (per user examples).

existing_features.title: Implement per-round-robin-stage advancement rules so that each round-robin stage can independently define where the winner and runner-up advance (either into a specific knockout entry point such as Pre-Quarterfinal/Quarterfinal/Semifinal, or into the next round-robin stage).

Correct qualification and counting logic to match the user’s examples, including multi-stage routing (e.g., winners from Round Robin 1 directly to knockout + winners from Round Robin 2 to knockout, with Round Robin 2 being composed of Round Robin 1 runner-ups).

Enforce “only valid” progression combinations by validating that the number of knockout-qualified teams exactly matches the first enabled knockout round size (16 for Pre-Quarterfinal, 8 for Quarterfinal, 4 for Semifinal, 2 for Final), and block tournament generation when invalid (no auto-byes).

Update knockout bracket generation so it does not simulate winners to populate later knockout rounds; instead, generate a manually adjustable bracket where match participants can be manually assigned/changed, consistent with the requirement that the knockout bracket is manually adjustable.

Implement the missing UI components for configuring per-stage advancement and (if needed) stage-to-stage group assignment so the user can fully define: number of teams, number of round-robin stages, groups per stage, and per-stage advancement routing for winner/runner-up.

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow manual entry of tournament setup: number of teams, number of round-robin stages, and number of groups per round-robin stage.
Support per-round-robin-stage advancement rules (e.g., winner/runner-up advancing to specific knockout stage or to next round-robin stage).
Validate and enforce only valid progression combinations (no auto-byes); prevent configurations that don't produce valid knockout sizes.
Provide manually adjustable knockout bracket generation/management for pre-quarter/quarter/semi/final stages based on qualified teams.
